CSL_UhpiHandle UHPI_open (CSL_UhpiInsId instance, CSL_UhpiObj *UhpiObj, CSL_Status *status)

CSL_Status UHPI_Close (CSL_UhpiHandle hUhpi)

Function Documentation

CSL_Status UHPI_Close ( CSL_UhpiHandle  hUhpi)

============================================================================
UHPI_Close

Description
Close the handle to UHPI and stops the clock to UHPI

Arguments 

            None

Return Value CSL_Status

  • CSL_SOK - Returned for success CSL_ESYS_BADHANDLE - Bad handle passed

Pre Condition
UHPI_open should be called successfully.
None

Post Condition

Example 

            Status = UHPI_Close(hUhpi);
			if( Status != CSL_SOK )
			{
			 printf("UHPI_Close is failed\r\n");
			}

============================================================================

CSL_Status UHPI_Config ( CSL_UhpiHandle  hUhpi,
CSL_UhpiSetup *  UhpiSetup 
)

============================================================================
UHPI_Config

Description
Configures the UHPI CSL module

Arguments 

            instanceNum      UHPI Hardware instance number

Return Value CSL_Status

  • CSL_SOK - Returned for success
  • CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS - Invalid parameter

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
Initializes UHPI module

Modifies
UHPI Object structure

Example 

            CSL_Status    status;
            status = UHPI_config(hUhpi,&Uhpisetup);

============================================================================

CSL_UhpiHandle UHPI_open ( CSL_UhpiInsId  instance,
CSL_UhpiObj *  UhpiObj,
CSL_Status *  status 
)

============================================================================
UHPI_open

Description
Open the handle to the UHPI CSL module

Arguments 

            instance      UHPI Hardware instance number
            UhpiObj		  UHPI CSL object
            CSL_Status	  CSL status

Return Value CSL_Status

  • CSL_SOK - Returned for success
  • CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS - Invalid parameter CSL_ESYS_BADHANDLE - Bad handle passed

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
Initializes UHPI module

Modifies
UHPI Object structure

Example 

            CSL_UhpiHandle hUhpi;
            hUhpi = UHPI_open(CSL_UhpiInsId	instance,
									 CSL_UhpiObj		*UhpiObj,
		  						     CSL_Status 		*status)

============================================================================
